comments:
Eclipse 3.0 I20030917 (and several Integration builds before that)

In org.eclipse.swt.win32 select the build.xml ant script and run the 
build.jars target.

The same thing happens for other platforms too.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.tools.ant.types.Commandline$Argument.setPath
(Commandline.java:149)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JDTCompilerAdapter.setupJavacCommand
(JDTCompilerAdapter.java:183)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JDTCompilerAdapter.execute
(JDTCompilerAdapter.java:80)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Javac.compile(Javac.java:842)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Javac.execute(Javac.java:682)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:341)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:309)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:336)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:1339)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.execute(Ant.java:397)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.CallTarget.execute
(CallTarget.java:143)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:341)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:309)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:336)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:1339)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.execute(Ant.java:397)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.CallTarget.execute
(CallTarget.java:143)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:341)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:309)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:336)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:1339)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets(Project.java:1255)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.run
(InternalAntRunner.java:583)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.run
(InternalAntRunner.java:381)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324)
	at org.eclipse.ant.core.AntRunner.run(AntRunner.java:337)
	at 
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.AntLaunchDelegate$1.run
(AntLaunchDelegate.java:206)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:534)

It appears to be a jdt core problem from their Ant compiler adapter.

If you make use of the default compiler (do not set build.compiler to 
org.eclipse.jdt.core.JDTCompilerAdapter in your buildfile), my experience has 
been that the build is successful.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 43600 ***
